Articles.Content:
Executive Passenger Aircraft for the Modern Age

Kerbstream Aerospace dreams to provide modern and luxurious executive travel solutions to today's modern executives.

The Kerbstream fleet extends from large regional and continental airliner grade aircraft to luxurious and expansive light utility turboprops, with continuous new innovations on the rise.

Spoiler

The Kerbstream Global Series 200 is a light executive passenger transport designed for short regional transport. The GS200 sports a spacious cabin with comfortable arrangements for four passengers, including a full service minibar, micro kitchen suite including a compact oven, microwave, and three liter coffee machine. The kitchen also includes a 4.4 cubic meter pantry space, and 2 cubic meter beverage refrigerator and freezer.

The GS200 sports two KS-J20 turbofans, putting out a maximum of 42.3kN of thrust. The internal fuel tanks have a combined capacity of 313 liters of JET-A (253.53kg) 

(Images soon to come. Check back soon!)

Spoiler

The Kerbstream Global Series 300 is a medium executive passenger transport (A fuselage extention of the GS200) designed for short regional transport. The GS300 sports the same luxerious cabin with comfortable arrangements for six passengers, including a full service minibar, micro kitchen suite, and other accoutrements.

The GS300 sports two KS-J20 turbofans, putting out a maximum of 42.3kN of thrust. The internal fuel tanks have a combined capacity of 313 liters of JET-A (253.53kg) 

(Images soon to come. Check back soon!)

(Please excuse the dust, this post is most definitely a work in progress. Images of the aircraft and further details will be added in the near future.)

Edited January 2, 2017 by SpaceToad
